name: Zombie Groove
description:
A completely new rhythm game that you can enjoy with a sense of rhythm


Zombie Groove is a rhythm game where you can enjoy the 'Groove' of music.

Completely different from the existing rhythm games that input rhythm quickly and accurately,
It is a game that focuses on the sense of musical rhythm while feeling the grooves with your body.

By realizing the feeling of nodding your hand or head involuntarily to the rhythm of the music as a game, You can enjoy a high-level sense of rhythm as if you were pushing and pulling the beat.

If you are a gamer who lacks a sense of rhythm no matter how good you are at existing rhythm games, Zombie Groove is a very difficult game.
Conversely,
if you are confident in your sense of rhythm, it will be an opportunity for you to have a new experience that you will never miss.

A whole new kind of fun awaits you that you can never guess with your own eyes.
Drop yourself into the grooves and enjoy the joy of playing an instrument while rocking it.

* The game's music is constantly being updated, and you can use either live streaming on YouTube or MP3 files.
